actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to reduce temporarily the duty on certain pepperoncini prepared or preserved by vinegar or acetic acid in concentrations at 0.5 percent or greater.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to reduce temporarily the duty on certain pepperoncini prepared or preserved by vinegar or acetic acid in concentrations at 0.5 percent or greater.

titles.title: A bill to reduce temporarily the duty on certain pepperoncini prepared or preserved by vinegar or acetic acid in concentrations at 0.5 percent or greater.
